name: Monster Detective
description:
Originally create August 21-24th 2015 for the Ludum Dare 33.

Monster Detective is a mystery adventure platformer!
Someone here is a monster, but who? You, Mr Monster Detective McMillan McCoy, must collect evidence to accuse someone of treachery!

Controls:
W,D - Move left and right
Q - Show Map (You can click on unlocked rooms to go to them)
E - Show Notepad
Space - Interact
M - Mute toggle

Programming - @smol_jordan
Art - @sirmivorint, @FourSnail, @Brasschee
Music - @Brasschee
